changeSet.author: jkakkad
changeSet.comment: KPME-3695 - Adding Rice KIM Role Permissions bootstrap data

column.name: PERM_TMPL_ID
column.valueComputed: (SELECT PERM_TMPL_ID FROM KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T WHERE NMSPC_CD = 'KPME-WKFLW' AND NM = 'Create KPME Maintenance Document')

column.name: DESC_TXT
column.value: Allows users to create a Shift Differential Rule Type

column.name: KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID
column.valueComputed: (SELECT KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID FROM KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T WHERE NMSPC_CD = 'KR-WKFLW' AND NM = 'documentTypeName')

column.name: KIM_TYP_ID
column.valueComputed: (SELECT KIM_TYP_ID FROM KRIM_TYP_T WHERE NMSPC_CD = 'KR-SYS' AND NM = 'Document Type & Routing Node or State')

column.name: PERM_TMPL_ID
column.valueComputed: (SELECT PERM_TMPL_ID FROM KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T WHERE NMSPC_CD = 'KPME-WKFLW' AND NM = 'Edit KPME Maintenance Document')

column.value: Allows users to edit a Shift Differential Rule Type
